listPoints.title: Do I need an attorney to apply for expungement?
listPoints.description: While not required, consulting an attorney can help navigate the process.

listPoints.title: Can all criminal records be expunged?
listPoints.description: No, certain serious offenses are not eligible for expungement in New Jersey.

listPoints.title: What if my petition for expungement is denied?
listPoints.description: You may consult legal counsel to explore options, which might include reapplying after a certain period.
